title: Psychology of Anxiety and Stress Management
headline: Explore the causes of anxiety and stress and learn how to treat their symptoms in this free online psychology course.
description: Do you ever get anxious or stressed out and don't know what to do? This psychology course lays out the causes of anxiety and stress and explains how to deal with them. We show you how a healthy diet and simple lifestyle changes like regularly exercising and deep breathing techniques can give you more control over your mental health. Sign up to identify the specific sources of your stress and anxiety and learn how to deal with them effectively.
courseDescription:
Do you know that an estimated 275 million people suffer from anxiety disorders? This represents about 4% of the global population as people face situations that, if not handled properly, can lead to chronic stress and clinical anxiety in the long run. This psychology course teaches you how to manage stress and anxiety and examines various treatments used by professional psychologists to improve their patients’ mental health.

We begin with simple definitions of ‘stress’ and an examination of its primary causes. We explain that stress is not always harmful to the body and can actually improve your life. The course then lays out the major risk factors associated with stress. A ‘normal’ level of stress can be managed by employing some simple stress management techniques. We study such techniques with the help of various real-life scenarios and practical examples to provide a practical understanding of the psychology behind stress.

Exercise is essential for maintaining one's physical health but also plays a role in improving our mental health. The course establishes the role of exercise in managing stress and anxiety disorders. We then discuss psychiatric options like drugs and clinical treatments that professionals use to treat severe stress and anxiety. This course suits anyone who is concerned about the impact of stress and anxiety and is interested in using mindfulness techniques to improve their mental health. It also suits professional psychologists and psychiatrists who want to stay current on the most advanced treatment techniques.
